SELECT T1.RNUM, T1.CODE_CD, T1.CODE_ID, T1.CODE_NM, T1.CODE_ORDR, T1.USE_YN, T1.CREATE_ID, T1.CREATE_NM, DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS CREATE_DATE, T1.UPDATE_ID, T1.UPDATE_NM, DATE_FORMAT(T1.UPDATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPDATE_DATE
FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY CODE_ID ASC) AS RNUM, TCC.CODE_CD, TCC.CODE_ID, TCC.CODE_NM, TCC.CODE_ORDR, TCC.USE_YN, TCC.CREATE_ID, (SELECT TU.USER_NM FROM TB_META_USER TU WHERE TCC.UPDATE_ID = TU.CREATE_ID ) CREATE_NM, TCC.CREATE_DATE, TCC.UPDATE_ID, (SELECT TU.USER_NM FROM TB_META_USER TU WHERE TCC.UPDATE_ID = TU.CREATE_ID ) UPDATE_NM, TCC.UPDATE_DATE FROM TB_CMM_CDDTL TCC
WHERE 1=1
) T1
WHERE T1.RNUM BETWEEN ((#{cntPerPage} * (#{curPage}-1)) + 1) AND (#{cntPerPage} * #{curPage})
ORDER BY CODE_ID ASC, CODE_ORDR ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_CMM_CDDTL TCC WHERE 1=1
